author: Caddi Ranyard
comment: This is a beautiful watch face with all the functions I need as customisations.  I bought the premium version.

author: Andrew Gutierrez
comment: love it

author: Jonathan Greever
comment: This is a beautiful, full-featured watch face.  My only complaint is that it's supposedly focused on the weather (it's in the name, after all) but unless my watch GPS is enabled, the weather only updates if I force it to from the phone app. I have the full version and I have it set to update every hour in the app but it doesn't. The "update" feature won't work from the watch, either.   I'm using a Ticwatch E.   It would be nice if the weather auto updates would work for my device using the phone-only location setting.

My favorite watch face.  Nothing else I have tried comes close.  The options for launching apps is unsurpassed.  Love the real time weather view (get compliments on it all the time).  Also love the custimization.

author: mark walsh
comment: One of my favourite faces.

author: David Smith
comment: Pity that having bought premium, it only applies to one watch face.  There should be at least a substantial discount on extra faces in the set. After a while, the weather update stops working, and I have to switch off a nd restart my phone to get an update.  Restarting alone does not work, and this procedure is needed, then for every update. This is a pity. This is an otherwise excellent app, though it is somewhat unstable.  A few less bells and whistles would be better, if that improved stability.

author: raymond milewski
comment: Running on ticwatch s ..App is nice.. I bought the paid version, fit info doesn't sync, phone battery info doesn't sync, find my phone button does not work.. will add to the list when I discover more flaws

author: Daniel Steeves
comment: Best I've used yet But Why can't I change the colour of the hand contrast in ambient mode (it forces to green) .. But should at least match the selected accent colour

author: Otto Dovahkiin
comment: Works great worth the money

author: Trish Lupi
comment: My favourite watch face. I rarely buy apps but happily paid for this one. A suggestion to developers: if you could make the night sky reflect the true phases of the moon I would never change watch face again!

author: Mike Morley
comment: Nice, paid for premium and getting being spammed about getting Christmas watch face, also would be good to have option to hide the other watch advertisements. These are fine when using free app....

author: Kevin Chapman
comment: This is a great watch face, however the step counter does not show any readings ( it just remains zero), otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

author: David Scott
comment: Settings don't stay. Annoying

author: Marty Kinnamon
comment: Does not displayed heart rate info.

author: Shayne
comment: Great App and also good for battery usage.

author: dale brown
comment: Nice watch face

author: Mark Wong
comment: Although this watchdogs is very informative, it Uses up too much battery life ... and will not last thru the night even with no activity.

author: Sean Gilbert
comment: Was brilliant but the recent update keeps telling me that I have the premium upgrade but I can't access premium items

author: Syed Nabi
comment: Thanks again for all of you G

author: Aaron Gray
comment: It decent but expected more for a premium priced paid app. The good.... Has good built in app Hotspot for the screen. You can put just about any app right on the home screen. The bad..... Basic watch faces with not much customization. The easiest thing to fix would be watch faces and customization of them. It does have a decent base watchface to work with but it's lacking the most basic attributes.

author: Mario Medley
comment: I don't know what happened in a recent update.,but my LG G Watch no longer shows this watch face. I still have the app in my Android wear app on my phone.,but it's not displaying on my watch anymore!

author: Krisztian Barabas
comment: This is very good except some issues. Here are: It seems the watchface covers/hides the calling screen. Hour and minute hands colour is dark grey hard to recognize. Weather background could be more detailed. I bought it because it was not so expensive and very good stuff, so they earned the money.  I respect you guys because the free version functionality is rich enough!

author: Dave J
comment: Would like a full color ambient, thought premium would have it. It doesn't. Really wish developers would allow this as an option.

author: Jose Andres Montoya Cabrera
comment: Good app so far, but the music controller keeps saying that phone is not connected while everything else works. Any help?

author: Richard Clayton
comment: Anything with notifications is bad, devs stop with app notifications, I will always delete your app, always.

author: yadunandan.h.r yadu
comment: Weather is not updating properly,Simply wasted my money by buying premium.

author: Laura Childers
comment: Tried over and over to sync with my gear 2, had to uninstall- disappointed

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Good, but no full-color ambient mode and spams you with unsolicited notifications. Good support.

author: Audrey Blair
comment: Just got the app a few weeks ago. So far I like it  Still trying to decide if I want to upgrade to premium

author: Kiyoto- Kobayashi
comment: Sometime not connecting for my MOTO360  2nd. I have to reset for my Moto!???

author: Santosh Gehlot
comment: Applly all wear app

author: Roy Dorsey
comment: Great watch, let's me make it my watch.

author: Abdul Basit
comment: I like

author: Boby Cruz
comment: Make it more useful

author: Dave Sharpe
comment: First impression, first day:  pretty cool.  Lots of customization.  I would like to be able to over-ride the weather -based face color.  It won't show Moto G5   battery status, always "0".  I'll report more after a couple of weeks.  If I can get the phone battery indicator to work, it may be a 5-star, even without being able to change face color.

author: Chris Kasallis
comment: Everything is great except the weather temp is not accurate for the high of the day.  I only have the trail version but if that isn't correct then I can't justify paying either.

author: wAiL Najdi
comment: Can not connect with phone notifications comes but when i try to set up watch from phone message came try re reconnect

author: Jody Garrett
comment: It's always 66 degrees... No future weather and it's always sunny.

author: Robert Belanger
comment: When I have to study it more, I can tell you more

author: Derm3kloun Tverkrobyarng
comment: Please help me to open
